abstract: The citation of Judge Jed S. Rakoff’s rejection of a proposed settlement between the Securities and Exchange Commission and Citigroup shows that judges elsewhere have noticed the ruling.
snippet: The citation of Judge Jed S. Rakoff’s rejection of a proposed settlement between the Securities and Exchange Commission and Citigroup shows that judges elsewhere have noticed the ruling.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — A federal judge in Wisconsin has challenged the Securities and Exchange Commission over a proposed settlement of fraud charges against a publicly traded company, citing as a precedent the agency’s pending case against Citigroup.

headline.main: In Challenging S.E.C. Settlement, a Judge in Wisconsin Cites a Court in New York
headline.print_headline: In Challenging S.E.C. Settlement, a Judge in Wisconsin Cites a Court in New York
